origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'NaturalDisasterAPI.get_records', 'description': 'This function retrieves historical records of natural disasters for a specified region and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region for which to retrieve disaster records.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the records, e.g., 10 years, 5 years.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'records', 'description': 'The historical records of natural disasters for the specified region and time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 NaturalDisasterAPI.get_records, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'California', 'timeFrame'是'10 years'.

prediction:
Task: Call the function NaturalDisasterAPI.get_records with the parameters 'region': 'California', 'timeFrame': '10 years'.

Solution:

NaturalDisasterAPI.get_records(region='California', timeFrame='10 years')
